title: Building a healthier Brooklyn: Aeroqual & Langan collaborate
summary: Aeroqual partnered with Langan Engineering & Environmental for air monitoring on the Alafia Development project in Brooklyn, NY. Langan used Aeroqual's AQS monitors and software to comply with DER-10 CAMP requirements for reporting and controlling PM10, VOC, and methane emissions during the $1.2 billion multi-phase construction project.
